title: TIMES OF INDIA COMPLAINS BUDDHA’S 2600 YEARS OF ENLIGHTENMENT NOT AN EVENT FOR MANY INDIAN STATES
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana While most Asian countries are planning to exploit the occasion of 2,600 years of enlightenment of Buddha, seven Indian states having Buddhist heritage have not spent anything substantial to tap tourists from Buddhist-majority Asian tiger economies and China, during the last two decades .complained the Times of India…
